name: Jill's Nightmare
description:
GENRE- 2d Horror Shooter.

DESCRIPTION- This is a game of the famous Resident Evil series. The game takes place after the events of Resident Evil 3 and whatever you play is just a Jill's dream. In this game you take control of JILL VALENTINE in a mansion. Make your way out of this nightmare by finding various keys and by killing your enemies using a large variety of weapons available.

KEY FEATURES -

- A short story line after the events of Resident Evil 3.

-Several type of enemies namely zombies, dogs, spiders, crows etc.

-A wide range of weapons to choose from.

-Two nightmarish bosses to deal with.

-Gain money by killing creatures to buy new weapons and other items.

-Search for the key items to escape the mansion.
